channel.title: Modeling Problem
channel.description: So i got a model, i made the sleeves and the body seperate but when i try to make the .dat for them i cant. in the dat maer under animation there is no sleeve or body animation so the body is still when im walking and so are the sleeves but the sleeves look like their broken. how do i make this work? heres a pic: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img354.imageshack.us/img354/7130/94175903ao3.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img354/94175903ao3.png/1/][IMG]http://img354.imageshack.us/img354/94175903ao3.png/1/w226.png[/img][/URL] thank you
